thread.title: 5 trending stories about Motorola’s new Moto 360 watch
thread.title_full: 5 trending stories about Motorola’s new Moto 360 watch | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: 5 trending stories about Motorola’s new Moto 360 watch
text:
Motorola grabbed its share of new-gadget headlines this week, with the introduction of the second-generation of the Moto 360 smartwatch .
More popular and trending stories
Google introduced Android Wear for iOS days earlier, allowing iPhone users to pair their phones with the Moto 360.
Consumers are paying attention, judging from these five trending headlines about the Moto 360:
For Motorola's latest smartwatch, it's all about freedom of choice (Yahoo) The Moto 360 and Moto 360 sport are the first smartwatches that you can truly customize (Digital Trends) Moto X Pure Edition review: the third time really is the charm (Engadget) Moto 360 (2015) Hands On: Design First, Tech Second (Gizmodo) Motorola's new Moto 360 comes in three variants: Two for men, one for women (PC World) And Wired magazine says the Moto 360 may be the prettiest smartwatch on the market.
The new Moto 360 just may be the prettiest smartwatch yet http://t.co/VnYEYO565Z pic.twitter.com/Ico8kzsvZG
— WIRED (@WIRED) September 2, 2015
